data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coleman, Charles Oliver, Lowry, James K. (2014): Epimeria rafaeli sp. nov. (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Epimeriidae) from Western Australia. Zootaxa 3873 (3): 218-232, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.3.2
